item.title: Reflections from my first year at design school
item.description: Exactly one year back, I decided to leave my job as a UX Designer and joined National Institute of Design, Bangalore to pursue Post Grad in Information & Interface Design. A year later, I felt it would be a good time to reflect on a few things.
